people.name: 'Nard-Dog
bulletPoints: I can play the banjo, innit?
And if you hadn't noticed, I've got a pretty good British accent.

people.name: Lorem Ipsum
bulletPoints: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.
Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old.
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
